Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの紋章の石碑
<Cyan>「ふたつの身体……ひとつの心…… 友愛と団結の旗……共に戦い ……歩み……安らぎ……」<White> といった内容が、古代カレギア文字で 刻まれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <Cyan>"Two bodies...one heart... Flag of solidarity and unity... Fight side by side... Steps towards...peace..."<White> These are inscribed in ancient Callegean scripture.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140> 石碑を読む 石碑を見る やめる

<speed:00>聖なる王と六つの聖者は、ガジュマを支配しようと したヒューマの処遇を巡って対立した。 王はヒューマをせん滅しようとし、六人の聖者は 闇、炎、風、水、光、土の力を合わせて王と戦った。 世界は大混乱に陥り、長い戦いの果てに王は倒され、 体は滅んだが、王の怒りは思念となって散った。 思念は人々にとりつき、憎しみを高め対立を生んだ。 六人の聖者は聖なる力を合わせて思念を浄化し、 王の精神をゴルドバの月と呼ばれる石に封じた。 これが聖なる戦いである。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>The Sacred King and the Six Saints confronted each other over the treatment of Huma, who tried to rule over the Gajuma. The Sacred King had wanted to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and earth in order to combat him. The world was then thrown into chaos, and after a long battle, the king was left defeated and his body destroyed. But even then, his anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people, increasing their hatred and creating conflict. The Six Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge and sealed the king's spirit in a stone called the Moon of Goldova. This is the story of the Holy War.

Entry.JapaneseText: これは…… ハックのメモ……？
<speed:00> やっと解読が終わったよ！ ここに来たキミのために メモを残しておくからね！ やったぞぉぉッ!! ハック
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> I've finally deciphered it! I'm leaving a note for you when you arrive here. I did it, maan!!!! - Hack

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>聖なる王と六つの聖者は、ガジュマを支配しようと したヒューマの処遇を巡って対立した。 王はヒューマをせん滅しようとし、六人の聖者は 闇、炎、風、水、光、土の力を合わせて王と戦った。 世界は大混乱に陥り、長い戦いの果てに王は倒され、 体は滅んだが、王の怒りは思念となって散った。 思念は人々にとりつき、憎しみを高め対立を生んだ。 六人の聖者は聖なる力を合わせて思念を浄化し、 王の精神をゴルドバの月と呼ばれる石に封じた。 これが聖なる戦いである。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>The Sacred King and the Six Saints confronted each other over the treatment of Huma, who tried to rule over the Gajuma. The Sacred King had wanted to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and earth in order to combat him. The world was then thrown into chaos, and after a long battle, the king was left defeated and his body destroyed. But even then, his anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people, increasing their hatred and creating conflict. The Six Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge and sealed the king's spirit in a stone called the Moon of Goldova. This is the story of the Holy War.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>聖なる王と六つの聖者は、ガジュマを支配しようと したヒューマの処遇を巡って対立した。 王はヒューマをせん滅しようとし、六人の聖者は 闇、炎、風、水、光、土の力を合わせて王と戦った。 世界は大混乱に陥り、長い戦いの果てに王は倒され、 体は滅んだが、王の怒りは思念となって散った。 思念は人々にとりつき、憎しみを高め対立を生んだ。 六人の聖者は聖なる力を合わせて思念を浄化し、 王の精神をゴルドバの月と呼ばれる石に封じた。 これが聖なる戦いである。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>The Sacred King and the Six Saints confronted each other over the treatment of Huma, who tried to rule over the Gajuma. The Sacred King had wanted to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and earth in order to combat him. The world was then thrown into chaos, and after a long battle, the king was left defeated and his body destroyed. But even then, his anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people, increasing their hatred and creating conflict. The Six Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge and sealed the king's spirit in a stone called the Moon of Goldova. This is the story of the Holy War.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 六人の聖者たちは、闇・炎・風・水・光・？の 力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and ? and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇・炎・風・水の力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, and water and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇・炎・風の力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, and wind and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇と炎の力で戦い、王を倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness and fire and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者は闇の力をもって戦い、王を倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the saint used their power of darkness and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者は王と戦い、倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the saint fought and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><Cyan>「聖なる王と……の聖者……戦い…… ……聖なる王……倒され…… 王の怒り満ち……憎しみ……争い…… 聖者の力……思念消え……危機去る」<White> といった内容が、古代カレギア文字で 刻まれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><Cyan>"The Sacred King and the...Saints... combat...Sacred King...defeated... King's anger... hatred... conflict... Saints...holy power... scourge... crisis"<White> These are inscribed in ancient Callegean scripture.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの紋章の石碑
<speed:00><Cyan>「ふたつの身体……ひとつの心…… 友愛と団結の旗……共に戦い ……歩み……安らぎ……」<White> といった内容が、古代カレギア文字で 刻まれている。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><Cyan>"Two bodies...one heart... Flag of solidarity and unity... Fight side by side... Steps towards...peace..."<White> These are inscribed in ancient Callegean scripture.

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの紋章の石碑
<speed:00> 我ら ふたつの身体をひとつの心とし 友愛と団結の旗の下 共に戦い歩み 安らぎを大地にもたらさん。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00> Uniting our two bodies under one heart, Under the flag of solidarity and unity, We will fight side by side and make Steps towards bringing peace to the land.

Entry.JapaneseText: このあいだは助けてくれて ありがとう。 何もお礼してなかったね。
Entry.EnglishText: Thank you for helping me the other day. I forgot my manners and didn't thank you at all.

Entry.JapaneseText: なんだか不思議ないわれのある 杖らしいんだ。大切に使ってよ。
Entry.EnglishText: It's said to have a mysterious use. Take good care of it.

Entry.JapaneseText: やあ、君たち！ この石碑の解読を進めているんだ。 内容を聞きたいかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, guys! We're trying to decipher this stone tablet. Do you want to know what it says?

Entry.JapaneseText: やあ、君たち！ 石碑の解読は進んでるよ。 内容を聞きたいかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, guys! We're making progress in deciphering the stone tablet. Do you want to know what it says?

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140> 解読内容を聞く やめる
わかった。石碑の事が 聞きたくなったら来てよね。 がんばって解読するからさ。
Entry.EnglishText: All right. Come back when you want to know more about the stone tablet. I'll do my best to decipher it.

Entry.JapaneseText: まずは、右の石碑から説明しよう。 これは比較的簡単だったよ。 石碑の内容はね……
Entry.EnglishText: Let's start with the stone tablet on the right. This one was relatively easy. The contents of the stone monument are...

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギアの紋章の石碑
我ら ふたつの身体をひとつの心とし 友愛と団結の旗の下 共に戦い歩み 安らぎを大地にもたらさん。
Entry.EnglishText: Uniting our two bodies under one heart, Under the flag of solidarity and unity, We will fight side by side and make Steps towards bringing peace to the land.

Entry.JapaneseText: こんな感じさ。 それから、こっちの石碑だけど、 壊れてる部分もあるし、 今、わかってるのはこれだけさ……
Entry.EnglishText: That's what it says. And this stone tablet over here, some parts are broken, and this is all we've got now.

Entry.JapaneseText: これまでにわかっているのは こんな感じさ……
Entry.EnglishText: Here's what we know so far...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>聖なる王と六つの聖者は、ガジュマを支配しようと したヒューマの処遇を巡って対立した。 王はヒューマをせん滅しようとし、六人の聖者は 闇、炎、風、水、光、土の力を合わせて王と戦った。 世界は大混乱に陥り、長い戦いの果てに王は倒され、 体は滅んだが、王の怒りは思念となって散った。 思念は人々にとりつき、憎しみを高め対立を生んだ。 六人の聖者は聖なる力を合わせて思念を浄化し、 王の精神をゴルドバの月と呼ばれる石に封じた。 これが聖なる戦いである。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>The Sacred King and the Six Saints confronted each other over the treatment of Huma, who tried to rule over the Gajuma. The Sacred King had wanted to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and earth in order to combat him. The world was then thrown into chaos, and after a long battle, the king was left defeated and his body destroyed. But even then, his anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people, increasing their hatred and creating conflict. The Six Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge and sealed the king's spirit in a stone called the Moon of Goldova. This is the story of the Holy War.

Entry.JapaneseText: やっと終わったよ…… これがボクが解読できるすべてさ。 はあ、疲れたぁ……
Entry.EnglishText: It's finally done... That's all I can decipher. I'm beat...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 六人の聖者たちは、闇・炎・風・水・光・？の 力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, water, light, and ? and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 聖者が六人だったところまでは わかったんだけどねぇ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm still trying to decipher it. I got as far as to the part where there were six saints...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇・炎・風・水の力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, wind, and water and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 壊れた部分がなかなかどうして 大変だけど、がんばるよ！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm still trying to decipher it, Although the broken parts are making it tough, I'm still going!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇・炎・風の力で王と戦い倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness, fire, and wind and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 地道にやるしかないね！
Entry.EnglishText: I'm still trying to decipher it. Steadily making progress!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者たちは、闇と炎の力で戦い、王を倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the six saints combined their powers of darkness and fire and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 ちょっとずつだけど、進んでは いるから、また来てよね。
Entry.EnglishText: I'm still trying to decipher it. I'm making progress, little by little, so please come back.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者は闇の力をもって戦い、王を倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。 聖者は聖なる力で思念を浄化した。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the saint used their power of darkness and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 もっとがんばらなきゃ……
Entry.EnglishText: I'm still trying to decipher it. I have to work much harder...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00>かつて、聖なる戦いと呼ばれる争いがあった。 聖なる王がヒューマをせん滅しようとし、 聖者は王と戦い、倒した。 世界に思念が散って、人々にとりつき苦しめた。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><speed:00>Once, there was a conflict called the Holy War. The Sacred King had tried to destroy the Huma, and the saint fought and defeated the Sacred King. His anger and ideals lingered, transforming into something of a scourge. This scourge haunted the people. The Saints combined their holy power to purify the scourge.

Entry.JapaneseText: 参考になったかい？ まだまだ解読を続けるよ。 また聞きにおいでよね。
Entry.EnglishText: Did you find that helpful? I'm still trying to decipher it. Please come back and ask me again later.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000005>カレギアの紋章…… 周りに刻まれているのは 古代カレギア文字か……？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000005>The Callegean Crest... Are those ancient Callegean characters carved around it?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000006>「ふたつの身体……ひとつの心…… 友愛と団結の旗……共に戦い ……歩み……安らぎ……」 そんな事が書いてあるみたいね。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000006>"Two bodies...one heart... Flag of solidarity and unity... Fight side by side... Steps towards...peace..." That's all I can make out.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000007>ヒューマとガジュマの事か。
<voice:25000009>何かの戦いを描いた 石碑みたいですね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000009>There appears to be some kind of battle depicted on these stone tablets...

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500000a><Mao>、おまえたちが探してたのは、 これだったのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500000A><Mao>, is this what you two were looking for?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500000c>うむ…… 古代の遺跡だとは聞いていたが、 それがこれなのかどうかは…… <Hilda>、何と書いてあるかわかるか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500000C>Mm... I had heard it was a tablet from ancient times, but as to whether this is it... <Hilda>, can you read the inscriptions?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500000e>文字がはっきりしないけど、 確かに、<Blue>聖なる王<White>って書いてある……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500000E>The inscriptions are faded, but it's definitely about the <Blue>Sacred King<White>.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500000f>聖なる王…… 詳しい事は書いてないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500000F>The Sacred King... Does it not go into more detail?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000011>「聖なる王と……の聖者……戦い…… ……聖なる王……倒され…… 王の怒り満ち……憎しみ…… ……争い……」
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000011>"The Sacred King and the...Saints... combat...Sacred King...defeated... King's anger... hatred... conflict..."

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000012>……これが精一杯。 ブツ切れすぎて、なんだか よくわからないわね……
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000012>*Sigh*...That's the best I can do. It's all rather fragmented and difficult to make sense of.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000013>……アガーテがしていた話に 似ていないか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000013>Don't you think this sounds like the story that Agarte was telling us?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000014>……それもありますけど、 今の状況にも似ているような 気がしませんか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000014>Well noticed, though does it not also appear to reflect our current situation?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000016>かつての聖なる戦いにおいて、 聖なる王は聖者たちに倒されたが、 王の怒りだけが残り、影響を受けた 人々は憎しみ合い、争った。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000016>In a sacred battle in ages past, the Sacred King was bested by the Saints. The King's hatred, however, remained and its influence summoned a rivalry among his citizens.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000017>そして今、俺たちは儀式で 復活したゲオルギアスを倒した。 そのゲオルギアスの怒りが 人々を憎しみ合わせている。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000017>We have defeated Geyorkias and, as a result, his hatred now spreads across the kingdom as it did once before.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000018>じゃあなにか？ ゲオルギアスを倒したのは 間違いだったってのかよ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000018>What are you saying? Was us beating Geyorkias a mistake?!

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000019>落ち着け、<Tytree>。 あの時、俺たちには 戦う以外に道はなかった。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000019>Settle down, <Tytree>. At that time, we had no choice but to fight.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500001a>そうだヨ。 たとえ争いが起こるとわかっていても、 滅ぼされるよりは、ずっとマシでしょ？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500001A>Right. Even if we knew it would cause this, it's still way better than being destroyed.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500001c>……今、この国があるという事は、 何らかの理由で、ゲオルギアスの怒りや <Yellow>ヒト<White>の憎しみが消えたという事じゃ ないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500001C>...The kingdom's still here. Doesn't that mean at some point, Geyorkias' rage and <Yellow>mankind<White>'s hatred disappeared somehow?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500001d>「聖者の力……思念消え…… 危機……去る」
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500001D>"The power of the Saints... scourge...the crisis...was no more..."

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500001e><Yellow>聖者の力<White>…… <Blue>思念<White>というのは、 ゲオルギアスの怒りや <Yellow>ヒト<White>の憎しみの事か？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500001E>The <Yellow>Saints' Power<White>... Perhaps this <Blue>scourge<White> is referring to Geyorkias' wrath and the hatred of <Yellow>mankind<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500001f>きっと、ゲオルギアスの力に 匹敵する大きな力があるのよ。 その力を使えば、<Blue>思念<White>を消す事が できるんじゃないかしら？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500001F>A great power to rival that of Geyorkias' must exist. If we were to make use of it, perhaps we could purge the <Blue>scourge<White>?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000021>石碑の中に手がかりが あるかもしれない。 もう一度、調べてみよう。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000021>There may be more clues on the stone tablets. Let's look at them some more.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000024>これとよく似た印…… 紋章のようなものを 見たような気がする。 そう……ラジルダで。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000024>This seal is very familiar... I feel like I've seen it printed on something not long ago. ...Possibly in Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000025>確か、<Hilda>さんは 不思議な力の話を聞いて、 ラジルダに行ったんですよね？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000025>If I recall, you had heard about a mysterious power and traveled to Razilda in order to find it, correct?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000026>ラジルダに何か手がかりが あるかもしれんな。
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000026>Then perhaps our next clue is in Razilda.

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:25000029>あれ、クレアさん、 一緒に行かないの？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:25000029>Hey, you not coming with us, Claire?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500002a>え？ わ、私……？ 私が……行っても…… いいんですか？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500002A>Huh? M-me...? You people...do not mind if...I accompany you?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500002b>何言ってるの、当たり前でしょ？ クレアさんは、ずっと前から ボクたちの仲間なんだから。 ね、みんな？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500002B>What are you saying? Obviously we don't mind! We're friends after all! Right, guys?

Entry.JapaneseText: <voice:2500002d>クレア……一緒に行こう。 今さら帰るわけにも いかないだろう？
Entry.EnglishText: <voice:2500002D>Claire... Come with us. I can't ask you to return home alone now.

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:00><scale:0140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:00><scale:0140>Would you like to rest? Yes No
